name: Blobby Blast
description:
BLOBBY BLAST

Blobby Blast is a 2D shoot 'em up for Android Devices. The game is simple: touch the blaster with your finger and move it around to shoot the evil blobs coming from above! Collect coins to unlock more modes that change up the gameplay or buy stylish skins for your blaster or bullets and powerful items. Play regulary and complete challenges to unlock even more skins by levelling up and compete with your friends by reaching new highscores. Download now and discover what Blobby Blast has to offer!

Features
  • Enjoy the basic gameplay inspired by classic shoot 'em ups on your phone.
  • Unlock new modes that change the gameplay in interesting ways.
  • Collect coins to buy skins to shoot your way through the waves of enemies with style.
  • Buy items to get stronger and destroy even more evil blobs!
  • Play the game daily to complete challenges and check the daily shop for new interesting skins.
System Requirements

Platform: Android 4.4 or newer

Size of installed game: ~ 86 MB

An internet connection is required for getting the most recent news, the event shop and update notifications, but it is not needed to play the game itself.

*The game is currently not optimized for tablet resolutions
